We decided to make a quick list of the main features, check the pages to see the features in action" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:center|color:%237d7d7d" google_fonts="font_family:Dosis%3A200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1457685084862{margin-top: 8px !important;}" el_class="xs-font-1x"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1457543587107{margin-top: 97px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-light" title="Powerful Customizer" description="The Customizer with easy navigation and dozens of theme elements, select hundreds of amazing fonts, apply many pattern backgrounds and setup different theme setting and effects." style="icon-title" link="" bg_color="#00aeef" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-vector" title="FontAwesome Icons" description="Why be satisfied with just one set of icons when you can have two! Choose between the Font Awesome and Font Elegant icon packs." style="icon-title" link="" bg_color="#00aeef" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-hand" title="ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT" description="You can import all the demo content with only one click! We have a huge number of layouts that are easily imported." style="icon-title" link="" bg_color="#00aeef" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1457543076886{margin-top: 50px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-pin" title="Awesome Off-Canvas Menus Integration " description="The new Off-Canvas menus is now independent with Collapse Navigation for small screens. The Off-canvas sidebar displays content from a defined position. " style="icon-title" title_top="3" link="" bg_color="#00aeef" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-layout-1" title="Revolution Slider Included ($19 value)" description="The award winning Revolution Slider is included with the them worth $15. This beautiful responsive slider allows you to create stunning effects for your site. " style="icon-title" title_top="3" link="" bg_color="#00aeef" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-layout" title="visual composer included ($35 value)" description="Visual Composer provides convenience during the site creation. VC Addons give even more customization options." style="icon-title" title_top="3" link="" bg_color="#00aeef" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1457543197101{margin-top: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-support" title="Premium Support & Updates" description="We care about our clients very much. If you have a questions, contact us and we will answer your question shortly and resolve your issue." style="icon-title" link="" icon_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#00aeef"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-chart" title="SEO Optimised & Solid code " description="This theme is built with care allowing search engines to index the content of your site to achieve higher rankings." style="icon-title" link="" icon_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#00aeef"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-compare-5" title="BUILT-IN MEGA MENU" description="Our built-in mega menu is the perfect choice for large menus. You can set up columns and rows, use icons and upload background images easily." style="icon-title" link="" icon_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#00aeef"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1457543197101{margin-top: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-refresh" title="Language Translation" description="The theme includes the required .po & .mo files ready for translation. Easily translate using the Codestyling Location plugin, plug support for WPML & qTranslate for multi-language support." style="icon-title" link="" icon_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#00aeef"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-layout-1" title="AMAZING LAYOUT VARIATIONS" description="DID YOU KNOW: You can select your sidebar position (or no sidebar at all), choose a boxed or fullwidth layout and set a custom header, footer for your site all with the click of a button!" style="icon-title" link="" icon_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#00aeef"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][rit_icon_box type="custom" icon_custom="clever-icon-tablet" title="Fully responsive web design" description="It
